languages.text: "Ваша Светлость... Благодаря вашему прорыву нам удалось очистить территорию усадьбы. Сейчас, при поддержке авгуров вашего судна на орбите, наземные войска прочесывают улицы улья, отряды отправлены в глубины города, несколько групп было выделено... простите, все это вы увидите в отчетах".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thanks to your breakthrough, we were able to clear out the estate. Right now, with the aid of your ship's augurs from orbit, the surface troops are sweeping the streets of the hive. Squads have been sent deeper into the city, several units have been assigned... my apologies, of course you will learn of all this from the reports."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость... Благодаря вашему прорыву нам удалось очистить территорию усадьбы. Сейчас, при поддержке авгуров вашего судна на орбите, наземные войска прочесывают улицы улья, отряды отправлены в глубины города, несколько групп было выделено... простите, все это вы увидите в отчетах".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}Clementia's voice is being interrupted and sounds distorted because of the din of an agitated crowd in the background.{/n} "Thanks to your breakthrough, we were able to clear out the estate. Right now, with the aid of your ship's auspexes from the orbit, the surface troops are sweeping the streets of the hive. Squads have been sent deeper into the city, several units have been assigned... my apologies, of course you will learn of all this from the reports."

languages.text: 「陛下…御身が突破されたおかげで屋敷内を一掃することができました。現在、軌道上にある陛下の船の占術機の力を借りて、地上部隊がハイヴの通りを掃討しています。部隊は街の中にまで送られ、戦隊をいくつか割り当てました…申し訳ございません、詳細は報告書にてお伝えいたします」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thanks to your breakthrough, we were able to clear out the estate. Right now, with the aid of your ship's augurs from orbit, the surface troops are sweeping the streets of the hive. Squads have been sent deeper into the city, several units have been assigned... my apologies, of course you will learn of all this from the reports."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下…御身が突破されたおかげで屋敷内を一掃することができました。現在、軌道上にある陛下の船の占術機の力を借りて、地上部隊がハイヴの通りを掃討しています。部隊は街の中にまで送られ、戦隊をいくつか割り当てました…申し訳ございません、詳細は報告書にてお伝えいたします」

languages.text: “大人……感谢您突破重围，我们才得以将敌人清理出这座宫殿。现在，通过您飞船的轨道扫描结果，我们的地面部队正在扫荡巢都的街道。我们已经向城市深处派出了几支小队，还有一部分单位被部署在……抱歉，详细情况您可以稍后从报告中了解。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thanks to your breakthrough, we were able to clear out the estate. Right now, with the aid of your ship's augurs from orbit, the surface troops are sweeping the streets of the hive. Squads have been sent deeper into the city, several units have been assigned... my apologies, of course you will learn of all this from the reports."

traits.locale_text: “大人……感谢您突破重围，我们才得以将敌人清理出这座宫殿。现在，通过您飞船的轨道扫描结果，我们的地面部队正在扫荡巢都的街道。我们已经向城市深处派出了几支小队，还有一部分单位被部署在……抱歉，详细情况您可以稍后从报告中了解。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... Gracias a su intervención, hemos podido despejar sus tierras. Ahora mismo, gracias a la ayuda de los augures de su nave en órbita, las tropas de superficie están despejando las calles de la colmena. Hemos enviado varios escuadrones a lo más profundo de la ciudad y diversas unidades a... lo siento, toda esta información estará disponible en los informes».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thanks to your breakthrough, we were able to clear out the estate. Right now, with the aid of your ship's augurs from orbit, the surface troops are sweeping the streets of the hive. Squads have been sent deeper into the city, several units have been assigned... my apologies, of course you will learn of all this from the reports."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}... Gracias a su intervención, hemos podido despejar sus tierras. Ahora mismo, gracias a la ayuda de los augures de su nave en órbita, las tropas de superficie están despejando las calles de la colmena. Hemos enviado varios escuadrones a lo más profundo de la ciudad y diversas unidades a... lo siento, toda esta información estará disponible en los informes».

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie... Grâce à votre charge, nous avons réussi à libérer la zone. Avec l'aide des augures de votre vaisseau en orbite, nos troupes au sol sont en train de ratisser les rues de la ruche. Des escouades ont été envoyées au cœur de la ville, de nombreuses unités ont été affectées... Veuillez m'excuser, vous trouverez bien évidemment toutes ces informations dans les rapports. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thanks to your breakthrough, we were able to clear out the estate. Right now, with the aid of your ship's augurs from orbit, the surface troops are sweeping the streets of the hive. Squads have been sent deeper into the city, several units have been assigned... my apologies, of course you will learn of all this from the reports."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie... Grâce à votre charge, nous avons réussi à libérer la zone. Avec l'aide des augures de votre vaisseau en orbite, nos troupes au sol sont en train de ratisser les rues de la ruche. Des escouades ont été envoyées au cœur de la ville, de nombreuses unités ont été affectées... Veuillez m'excuser, vous trouverez bien évidemment toutes ces informations dans les rapports. »

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Dank Eures Durchbruchs konnten wir das Anwesen räumen. Im Moment säubern die Bodentruppen mit der Hilfe der Auguren Eures Schiffs die Straßen der Makropole. Trupps wurden tiefer in die Stadt hineingeschickt, mehrere Einheiten zugewiesen ... verzeiht, das erfahrt Ihr natürlich alles aus den Berichten."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thanks to your breakthrough, we were able to clear out the estate. Right now, with the aid of your ship's augurs from orbit, the surface troops are sweeping the streets of the hive. Squads have been sent deeper into the city, several units have been assigned... my apologies, of course you will learn of all this from the reports."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Dank Eures Durchbruchs konnten wir das Anwesen räumen. Im Moment säubern die Bodentruppen mit der Hilfe der Auguren Eures Schiffs die Straßen der Makropole. Trupps wurden tiefer in die Stadt hineingeschickt, mehrere Einheiten zugewiesen ... verzeiht, das erfahrt Ihr natürlich alles aus den Berichten."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Açtığınız yarık sayesinde konak arazisini temizleyebildik. Şu anda kara birimlerimiz, geminizin yörüngeden sağladığı alametlerle kovan sokaklarını tarıyor. Şehrin derinlerine daha küçük birlikler gönderdik, bazı birimlerse... Affedersiniz, bu bilgiler raporlarda yazacak zaten."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thanks to your breakthrough, we were able to clear out the estate. Right now, with the aid of your ship's augurs from orbit, the surface troops are sweeping the streets of the hive. Squads have been sent deeper into the city, several units have been assigned... my apologies, of course you will learn of all this from the reports."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Açtığınız yarık sayesinde konağı temizleyebildik. Şu anda kara birimlerimiz, geminizin yörüngeden sağladığı alametlerle şehir sokaklarını tarıyor. Şehrin derinlerine daha küçük birlikler gönderdik, bazı birimlerse... Affedersiniz, bu bilgiler raporlarda bulunacaktır elbet."
